statements: SELECT * FROM player_profiles;
SELECT username, score FROM player_profiles;
SELECT score, progress FROM player_profiles;
SELECT * FROM player_profiles ORDER BY score DESC;
SELECT username, progress FROM player_profiles WHERE progress > 50;
SELECT * FROM player_profiles ORDER BY score DESC, progress ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT username, score FROM player_profiles WHERE score > 100 AND progress < 50;
SELECT DISTINCT username FROM player_profiles WHERE score BETWEEN 50 AND 100;
SELECT * FROM player_profiles WHERE progress > 75 ORDER BY username LIMIT 5 OFFSET 3;
SELECT username, score, progress FROM player_profiles WHERE username LIKE '%john%' OR username LIKE '%doe%' ORDER BY score DESC;
SELECT * FROM player_profiles;
SELECT id, username, score FROM player_profiles WHERE score > 100;
SELECT * FROM game_history WHERE level = 5;
SELECT player_profiles.username, game_history.completed FROM player_profiles JOIN game_history ON player_profiles.id = game_history.player_id;
SELECT player_profiles.username, game_history.level FROM player_profiles JOIN game_history ON player_profiles.id = game_history.player_id WHERE player_profiles.score > 200;
SELECT * FROM player_profiles WHERE score > 100 ORDER BY username DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT id, username, score FROM player_profiles WHERE progress < 0.5 AND score BETWEEN 50 AND 100 ORDER BY score ASC;

SELECT player_profiles.username, game_history.level, game_history.completed FROM player_profiles JOIN game_history ON player_profiles.id = game_history.player_id WHERE game_history.completed = true ORDER BY player_profiles.username, game_history.level DESC;

SELECT player_profiles.username, COUNT(*) AS total_games_played FROM player_profiles JOIN game_history ON player_profiles.id = game_history.player_id GROUP BY player_profiles.username HAVING total_games_played > 3 ORDER BY total_games_played DESC;

SELECT player_profiles.username, AVG(game_history.level) AS avg_level FROM player_profiles JOIN game_history ON player_profiles.id = game_history.player_id WHERE player_profiles.score > 75 GROUP BY player_profiles.username HAVING avg_level > 3 ORDER BY avg_level DESC;
SELECT * FROM player_profiles;
SELECT username, score FROM player_profiles WHERE player_id = 1;
SELECT player_id, progress, score FROM player_profiles ORDER BY progress DESC;
SELECT item_id, quantity FROM player_inventory WHERE player_id = 2;
SELECT player_id, sound_enabled, notifications_enabled FROM player_settings;
SELECT player_id, username, score FROM player_profiles WHERE score > 100 ORDER BY score DESC;
SELECT player_id, username, score, progress FROM player_profiles WHERE progress < 0.5 AND score > 50 ORDER BY progress ASC;
SELECT player_id, item_id, quantity FROM player_inventory WHERE quantity > 0 ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT player_id, sound_enabled, notifications_enabled FROM player_settings WHERE sound_enabled = TRUE AND notifications_enabled = FALSE;
SELECT player_id, username, score, progress FROM player_profiles JOIN player_inventory USING (player_id) WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY score DESC, progress ASC;
SELECT * FROM player_profile;
SELECT id, username, score FROM player_profile WHERE score > 1000;
SELECT achievement_id, achievement_name FROM achievements ORDER BY achievement_date DESC;
SELECT item_name, quantity FROM inventory WHERE player_id = 1;
SELECT player_id, total_games_played, win_ratio FROM game_stats WHERE total_games_played >= 10 ORDER BY win_ratio DESC;
SELECT * FROM player_profile;
SELECT username, score FROM player_profile ORDER BY score DESC;
SELECT player_id, achievement_name, achievement_date FROM achievements WHERE achievement_date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT item_name, quantity FROM inventory WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY quantity ASC;
SELECT player_id, total_games_played, win_ratio FROM game_stats WHERE win_ratio > 0.5 AND total_games_played >= 100 ORDER BY total_games_played DESC;
SELECT id, username, score, progress FROM player_profiles;
SELECT * FROM player_inventory WHERE player_id = 1;
SELECT player_id, friend_id FROM player_friends ORDER BY player_id ASC, friend_id DESC;
SELECT player_id, theme FROM player_settings WHERE sound_enabled = TRUE;
SELECT player_id, games_played, wins, losses FROM player_stats WHERE wins > losses;
SELECT * FROM player_profiles WHERE score > 100 ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT player_id, item_name, quantity FROM player_inventory WHERE quantity >= 10 ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT player_id, friend_id FROM player_friends WHERE player_id = 12345;
SELECT player_id, theme, sound_enabled FROM player_settings WHERE sound_enabled = TRUE;
SELECT player_id, games_played, wins, losses FROM player_stats WHERE games_played > 50 ORDER BY wins DESC;
